vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.10;
son of: Pedahzur (H6301)
§ Gamaliel = "reward of God"
son of Pedahzur and the leader of the tribe of Manasseh in the wilderness
vocabInfos._es_Definition: hijo de Pedasur; jefe; tribu de Manasés; en tiempos de Moisés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
迦瑪列 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "上帝的獎勵"
比大蓿的兒子, 為瑪拿西支派在曠野時的首領
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
迦玛列 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "上帝的奖励"
比大蓿的儿子, 为玛拿西支派在旷野时的首领
